text: On Keeping Up With The Kardashians, Kim Kardashian stopped by John Legend and Chrissy Teigen ‘ s house. But John wasn ’ t the only Legend in the house. There was also a living legend, Chrissy ’ s dad, Ron Teigen. Ron is a vest designer and his daughter jokingly suggested that Kim promote them on her Instagram. And Ron Teigen isn ’ t just an entrepreneurial vest designer. He also knows a thing or two about reality television. “ My dad is a big fan, ” said Chrissy, “ he ’ s been watching [ KUWTK ] for many years.
